name: Trubbel’s Utilities
description:
↓ Lots of features ↓

**Chat:**

– Custom commands

– First-time chatter indicator (for yourself)

– Clickable Steam inspect links

– Markdown support (bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, spoilers and timestamps)

– Highlight messages

– BTTV-like moderation

– Raid preview (image, video)

– Hide shared messages

– Translate chat messages

– Clickable usernames in /mods, /vips and raid messages

– Display recent messages in viewer cards

**Mod View:**

– Activity feed moderation

– Display emote and cheer tooltips in activity feed

– Automatically enter mod view

**Player:**

– Automatically reset player on error

**VODs:**

– Custom progress bar

– Custom seeking

– Frame by frame seeking

– Automatically skip muted segments

**Dashboard:**

– Show dashboard deletion date for past broadcasts

**Directory:**

– Display follow date in followed channels

– Display total followed channels

– Thumbnail previews

**Inventory:**

– Automatically claim drops

– Collapsible drops

**Overall:**

– Yet Another Prime Reminder

– Sidebar previews

– Pinned sidebar channels

– Automatically expand sidebar channels

…among other things…
author: Trubbel
